control

Class HomepageLibrarianController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.HomepageLibrarianController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreensIF

    public class HomepageLibrarianController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScreensIF
    HomepageLibrarianController is the controller after user logged in. this the main menu of the librarian, here he manages the actions in system. librarian got advanced premissions.
    Author:
    nire
